title: User Authentication with Email and Password
description: Verify that users can register, login, and reset password using email and password with password policies enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Register with valid email and strong password meeting policy
Verify registration is successful and user is logged in
Logout
Navigate to login page
Login with registered email and correct password
Verify login is successful
Logout
Navigate to login page
Request password reset with registered email
Verify reset password email is sent
Follow reset link and enter new compliant password
Verify password reset is successful
Login with new password
Verify login is successful

title: User Authentication with Google OAuth
description: Validate login, account linking, and session management via Google OAuth integration.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select login with Google option
Authenticate with valid Google account
Verify user is successfully logged into the platform
Logout
Select login with Google with invalid or canceled consent
Verify appropriate error or cancellation message is displayed

title: Onboarding Flow Completion and Data Persistence
description: Test that new users can complete onboarding flow steps and data persists across sessions; skipping optional steps does not block progress.

steps.description: Register a new user and start onboarding
Complete each onboarding step including workspace creation, team invite, plan selection, and initial task/budget setup
Verify data entered is saved and visible after each step
Logout mid-onboarding
Login again
Verify onboarding state is restored to last completed step
Test skip buttons at optional steps and finish onboarding
Confirm onboarding can complete without mandatory errors

title: Task Creation and Management with Subtasks and Comments
description: Verify creating tasks with priorities, subtasks, comments, time tracking, and block editor formatting works correctly and reflects in UI.

steps.description: Navigate to Tasks module
Create a new task and set a priority level
Verify the task appears with correct priority
Add multiple subtasks to the task
Verify subtasks are listed and can be toggled complete
Add comments to the task
Confirm comments display correctly and persist
Start and stop time tracking on the task
Verify time tracking records and updates
Use the Notion-style block editor to format task description
Check formatting is saved and shown correctly

title: Financial Management: Transactions, Budgets, and Reports
description: Ensure users can add, edit, and delete transactions, create and customize budgets, categorize expenses, and generate interactive charts and reports.

steps.description: Navigate to Finance module
Add income and expense transactions with various categories
Verify transactions are saved and categorized correctly
Create recurring bills and ensure automatic entries on schedule
Confirm recurring transactions appear on correct dates
Define budgets and assign categories
Verify budgets update when transactions occur
View interactive pie charts reflecting budget usage and category breakdowns
Validate chart data correctness and interactivity
Export financial reports to Google Sheets
Confirm export completes with accurate data

title: Project Management with Kanban Boards and Team Collaboration
description: Verify users can create projects, manage tasks on Kanban boards, drag and drop tasks between customizable status columns, and upload documents.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects module
Create a new project and define custom status columns
Verify project and columns are created successfully
Add tasks to the project board and assign to status columns
Confirm tasks appear in correct columns
Drag and drop tasks between statuses
Validate tasks update status correctly and UI reflects changes
Attach document files to tasks
Confirm documents upload and can be viewed/downloaded
Collaborate with team members by adding comments and updates
Verify real-time updates are received by all members

title: Workspace Management with Role-Based Permissions and Invitations
description: Test workspace creation, switching, member invitations with expirations, and role assignment enforcing access controls properly.

steps.description: Create a new workspace
Verify workspace is created and selected
Invite new members with specified roles and set invite expiration
Confirm invites are sent and expiration is enforced
Accept invite link with valid account
Verify new member joins workspace with correct role and permissions
Attempt to access restricted areas with insufficient role
Confirm access is denied appropriately
Switch between multiple workspaces
Verify active workspace context is updated accurately

title: Multi-language Support and Persistence
description: Ensure switching languages updates UI immediately and selected language persists across sessions and pages.

steps.description: Open language selector and switch to Portuguese
Verify UI text changes to Portuguese immediately
Navigate to different modules and verify language remains Portuguese
Confirm translations are consistent throughout the app
Logout and login again
Verify language preference is retained as Portuguese
Repeat steps for Spanish and English

title: Dashboard Functionality: Draggable and Customizable Cards
description: Verify dashboard loads with multiple cards showing tasks, projects, and financial summaries; cards can be dragged and customized with real-time data updates.

steps.description: Login and navigate to main Dashboard
Confirm default cards for tasks, projects, financial summaries, and activities are displayed
Drag cards to new positions
Verify card positions update and persist after page reload
Add or remove cards from dashboard configuration
Check dashboard reflects changes accordingly
Trigger task and finance updates in other modules
Confirm dashboard cards update data in real-time

title: PWA Features: Offline Mode, Installation, and Push Notifications
description: Test offline capabilities with local caching and syncing, PWA installation prompts, and receiving push notifications.

steps.description: Enable PWA install prompt and install the app
Verify app is installable and behaves as a PWA
Simulate offline mode by disabling network
Perform data entry actions such as creating tasks or editing projects
Verify actions are cached locally and UI informs about offline status
Restore network connection
Confirm cached data is synchronized with server correctly
Trigger push notification from server
Verify notification is received and displayed properly on the device

title: Google Workspace Integration: Gmail Invoice Scanning, Calendar Sync, and Sheets Export
description: Validate authorization flows for Google services and functionality of invoice scanning, calendar synchronization, and export to Sheets features.

steps.description: Navigate to Integrations settings
Initiate Google OAuth authorization for Gmail, Calendar, and Sheets scopes
Confirm authorization completes without errors
Use Gmail invoice scanner on sample emails with invoice attachments
Verify invoices are extracted and transactions are created accurately
Sync calendar events from Google Calendar
Confirm calendar events appear and update in Projects or Tasks modules
Export financial or task data to Google Sheets
Verify sheets contain correct and complete exported data

title: Security: Password Policies, Row-Level Security, and Data Encryption
description: Ensure strong password policies are enforced, row-level security restricts data access by user/role, and sensitive data is encrypted in transit and storage.

steps.description: Attempt to register with weak or common passwords
Verify registration is blocked with validation messages
Login with valid user and attempt to access data from other users or workspaces
Confirm access is denied and protected by row-level security policies
Intercept network traffic during authentication and data sync
Verify data is transmitted over encrypted channels (HTTPS)
Check database or storage for encryption of sensitive data
Confirm data at rest is encrypted as per LGPD compliance

title: Global Search Functionality with Keyboard Shortcuts and Categorized Results
description: Verify global search returns categorized results quickly and keyboard shortcuts open search interface and navigate results.

steps.description: Press keyboard shortcut to open global search
Confirm search interface opens timely and is focused
Enter search term that matches tasks, projects, and finances
Verify results are correctly categorized by type (tasks, projects, finances)
Use keyboard to navigate between categorized results
Ensure distinct focus management and selection works
Select a result and verify navigation to related module/page

title: Responsive UI Across Various Screen Sizes
description: Test the web app layout and usability on mobile phones, tablets, and large monitors ensuring all components are accessible and functional.

steps.description: Open the web app on mobile phone screen size
Verify sidebar collapses and navigation is usable
Interact with main modules (tasks, projects, finance) on mobile
Confirm features render correctly and inputs are accessible
Resize window to tablet and desktop screen sizes
Validate responsive layout adjusts properly without content overflow or hidden elements

title: User Settings: Profile Update, Notification Preferences, and Billing Management
description: Verify users can update profile details, change notification settings including push preferences, manage billing plans and connected integrations.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings > Profile
Update user information fields (name, email, avatar)
Confirm changes save successfully and persist after reload
Navigate to Notifications settings
Toggle various notification preferences and save
Verify preferences update and are respected (e.g., no notifications when disabled)
Access Billing settings to view current plan and payment methods
Upgrade or downgrade plan and confirm billing details update
Ensure billing changes are processed and reflected properly
Manage connected integrations (enable/disable Google integration)
Verify integrations status updates accordingly

title: Real-Time Data Syncing and Updates Across Modules
description: Confirm that changes in tasks, projects, finance, and budgets propagate instantly to all connected clients and UI reflects real-time updates.

steps.description: Open the application in two browser sessions logged in with same user or team
Create or update a task in one session
Confirm the second session updates instantaneously with the change
Add a transaction or edit budget in one session
Verify related dashboards and finance pages in second session update in real-time
Make project status changes and task movements on Kanban board
Ensure second session reflects these updates instantly

title: Error Handling: Invalid Inputs and Server Errors
description: Validate the app handles invalid user inputs and server errors gracefully with user-friendly messages and no data corruption.

steps.description: Enter invalid inputs in forms such as empty required fields, invalid email formats, or malformed numbers
Confirm validation errors are shown and forms prevent submission
Simulate server unavailability or timeout on data save or fetch requests
Verify app displays appropriate error notifications without freezing or crashing
Attempt actions that require permissions without correct role
Confirm access denied messages and no data leakage
